head.supplied: 11 November 1868. ¶ ¶ I do not know, esteemed Professor, if the 4 enclosed mosses went to you in the large collection, ¶ which you will have received by now through the kind agency of Councillor Reg...

p.seg: Sign. 630.1.1. 4, Arkivet, Svenska Litteratursällskapet i Finland, Universitetsbibliotek, Helsingfors, Finland.

Ich weiss nicht, verehrter Herr Professor, ob die 4 Moose, welche ich beischliesse, Ihnen in der grossen Sammlung zugegangen sind, welche Sie inzwischen durch die freundliche Vermittlung des Herrn Studienrath Dr Regel erreicht haben wird. Diese 4 Arten sind von Rockinghams Bay an der Nord-Ost-Küste Australiens.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: My friends Comte de Castelnau and Professor McCoy are always glad to exchange zoological objects. The Count works however now only on Coleoptera.

I do not know, esteemed Professor, if the 4 enclosed mosses went to you in the large collection,
M had sent all his Australian and New Zealand moss collections to Lindberg on loan; see M to O. Lindberg, 5 July 1868. which you will have received by now through the kind agency of Councillor Regel. These 4 species are from Rockingham Bay on the north-east coast of Australia.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: My friends Count de Castelnau and Professor McCoy are always glad to exchange zoological objects. The Count however now works only on Coleoptera.
